TopicTitle: In the spirit of cooperation and competition

Articles.Content:
Sorry for the delay, my internet was surging every five minutes, but here is the video - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gQpk95YX9ho&feature=youtu.be

Here's the save.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/118650187/KCBP/persistent.sfs

Edited August 2, 2013 by TheCanadianVendingMachine

Wicked job! I like the way it turned out, that's a neat design

I've gotten in touch with the next couple of people on the list, so we should see two more modules going up very soon! I'll also be making a post on Reddit soon to show off our hard work, that should bring in some more viewers. I'll drop the link in here as well when that's done.

Keep up the great work everyone!
Hey, totally missed the new mission. Awesome work!

Alright, back in Europe, back at internet, downloading KSP 21.1 now and will be ready to launch my module whenever required :-).

Just one question: When docking with my K.M.S.S. in orbit, i had my space station renamed to the ship that docked with it rather than it's original name. How do you avoid this?
Ok I am Back sorry for the unannounced absence but I went to BC to mine. When can I expect to have to put up my module?

Alright, back in Europe, back at internet, downloading KSP 21.1 now and will be ready to launch my module whenever required :-).

Just one question: When docking with my K.M.S.S. in orbit, i had my space station renamed to the ship that docked with it rather than it's original name. How do you avoid this?

Hmm, I'm not sure. I've never really paid close enough attention when I'm docking things to see if the name changes, heh. You can always just rename it from the control pod.

Ok I am Back sorry for the unannounced absence but I went to BC to mine. When can I expect to have to put up my module?

No worries! Welcome back, hope all is good Find any diamonds? I need to make a pick (sorry, lame Minecraft reference...)

Got you on the fuel depot in the last half, but depending on how things go you might be moved up a few spots. It's hard to keep this many people going in a proper order, heh. Still, you've probably got a good week or so before your module will be going up.
It was gold mining I Wish the trommel could catch diamonds . Glad to hear That i have a week because i still have 4 more .20 videos to put up.

Boompety Poobleeceety

Do we still need bumps really? I felt like one since this project needs some activity :-)
Boy, I'm almost inclined to suggest whoever's ready gets to fly the next mission. That way we're not waiting for a week between every flight.

Sounds good to me, if Nauthy agrees. Whoever's flying should call it then though, so we don't end up with two people making their video at once.

As i've already told Nauthy, i'm currently in the middle of an annoying mission, codename "Exams", and i'm restricted to a single hour on specific days. Along with getting the Dragontales channel arranged, i won't be having alot of time to launch my module in the near future. I'll be 'on time' most likely, just can't really move up my launch by much.

#EDIT: Misread OP.

Edited August 9, 2013 by Whackjob
Wrong thread, Whackjob?
Nope, but apparently my reading comprehension leaves much to be desired. I'll can that pic to save on space and withdraw.
I could go, I have an off sleeping schedule so long quiet awake nights await.

Aw, I missed it, I wanted to see what Whackjob posted

Having somebody else go next is a good idea, I was actually gonna make a post myself to address that. I spoke to AustralianFries at the beginning of the week and I figured we'd be good to go, but I'm guessing life got in the way 'cause I haven't gotten a reply to the second PM I sent. So if you want to upload your video, dharak, that'd be awesome! I know it'll screw up the order a bit, but it shouldn't be a big problem, especially if it means we can keep the show going without long breaks in between.
Nauthy, do you want to put the teams in the first post? So we know who's on what project?

Now you see why the IYMSS lasted across multiple updates.

My tankers are still ready and waiting for the propellent depot though!
Where can I get the save file? I can do it tonight if I could get it. If I can get it where will I upload it when I'm done.
Look at my post, it contains the save

If one of us has extra time during their run, we could also launch a station rearranger craft to... well, do what the name says. Might be usefull to make sure all gigantors have enough room and the station looks a bit... aesthetic, rather than just being a bunch of parts attached to the next availible docking port.

How do I use that as a save? Do i make a new save and overwrite the persistence?

EDIT:

Got it to work. Prepare to see the quick and scary production time of someone with too much free time.

Edited August 10, 2013 by dharak1

Ok, I am about to dock. Should I leave the huge orange tank docked? It has a total of 3 lvt30 engines as thrust and will dock on the back of the hab area.

EDIT:

Finished docking, where can I share the persistence that doesn't require an account or anything?

Edited August 10, 2013 by dharak1

Hmm.... pastebin?

Or just google something :-)

Aha, Pastebin. I had that on the tip of my tongue but couldn't remember the exact name. Thank you.

This is the science module you've added to, right?

Also, are both flights in the same save file? Can't get on KSP right now :-/.
